statements: SELECT post_title, post_content FROM content_calendar
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE platform = 'Twitter'
SELECT post_title, post_content, schedule_time FROM content_calendar WHERE platform = 'Facebook' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE schedule_time >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT post_id, platform, post_title FROM content_calendar ORDER BY platform, post_title
SELECT post_title, post_content FROM content_calendar WHERE platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE platform = 'Instagram' ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_title, schedule_time FROM content_calendar WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT post_title, platform FROM content_calendar WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM content_calendar WHERE platform IN ('Twitter', 'LinkedIn');
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM content_calendar WHERE id = 1;
SELECT post_content FROM content_calendar WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM content_calendar ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name FROM social_media_platforms WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' AND social_media_platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT post_content, social_media_platform FROM content_calendar WHERE social_media_platform = 'Facebook' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM content_calendar;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM content_calendar WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT c.*, s.platform_name FROM content_calendar c INNER JOIN social_media_platforms s ON c.social_media_platform = s.platform_name ORDER BY c.post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ContentCalendar;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM ContentCalendar WHERE social_media_platform='Twitter';
SELECT post_date, social_media_platform FROM ContentCalendar ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM ContentCalendar WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPlatforms WHERE platform_name='Instagram';
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM ContentCalendar WHERE social_media_platform = 'Facebook';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPlatforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT post_id, scheduled_time FROM ScheduledPosts WHERE scheduled_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT post_content, post_date, platform_name FROM ContentCalendar INNER JOIN SocialMediaPlatforms ON ContentCalendar.social_media_platform = SocialMediaPlatforms.platform_name;
SELECT * FROM ScheduledPosts WHERE post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM ContentCalendar WHERE post_date < NOW());
SELECT * FROM Posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Posts WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT post_id, post_date FROM Posts WHERE post_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Posts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT platform_name FROM Platforms WHERE platform_id = 3;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM Posts WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Schedules INNER JOIN Platforms ON Schedules.platform_id = Platforms.platform_id;
SELECT post_content, social_media_platform FROM Posts WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.platform_name FROM Users u JOIN Platforms p ON u.user_id = p.platform_id;
SELECT post_id, post_date, platform_name FROM Posts p JOIN Schedules s ON p.post_id = s.post_id JOIN Platforms pl ON s.platform_id = pl.platform_id ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_calendar;
SELECT title, schedule_date FROM content_calendar WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT account_manager, followers FROM social_media_platforms ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT title, body FROM content ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM accounts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_calendar WHERE schedule_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT id, title, social_media_platform FROM content_calendar WHERE social_media_platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT title, content FROM content_calendar WHERE schedule_date > '2022-08-01' AND social_media_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT cc.title, cc.schedule_date, smf.platform_name FROM content_calendar cc JOIN social_media_platforms smf ON cc.social_media_platform = smf.platform_name;
SELECT p.post_date, c.title, c.body FROM posts p JOIN content c ON p.content_id = c.id JOIN social_media_platforms smp ON p.platform_id = smp.id WHERE smp.platform_name = 'Facebook';
